price: Au wanayo ilimu ya ghaibu, nao wameandika?
footnotes: Bali kwani wao wanao ujuzi kujua mambo ya ghaibu, yaliyo fichikana, na hivyo wanaandika kutoka hayo wayatakayo?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
